Package edu.jhu.cs.oose.project.group14.ihungry.androidapp.activities

Class Summary
AboutmeActivity The view that shows the personal information of the user including name, gender, phone #, address, etc.
ActivityController This activity is responsible for view/activity transition.
FavouritesActivity This view is for showing the user's favourite items/restaurants.
LoginActivity This is the login screen - the first view that the user sees after entering the iHungry application.
MainScreenActivity This is the main screen of the app including four buttons: nearby, aboutme, favourites, and orderhistory.
NearbyActivity This is the view that shows the map with current location and restaurants around.
OrderandRestaurantInfoActivity This activity shows the detailed information about the specific restaurant and the menu is listed.
OrderHistoryActivity This view is used to show the order history of the user's.
OrderReviewActivity This view shows the detailed ordered items.
SignupActivity This view is for user-registration (sign-up).
